/work/doc/pages/Reconnection.md
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 \defgroup reconnection Reconnection
2 \ingroup advanced-programming
3 
4 \details
5 
6 When the session is in the active state, and there are some network issues, the Handler will try to restore the
7 connection
8 per OnixS::B3::BOE::SessionSettings::reconnectAttempts and OnixS::B3::BOE::SessionSettings::reconnectInterval settings.
9 
10 When a network error is detected, the session \ref session-states "changes its state" to
11 OnixS::B3::BOE::SessionStateId::Reconnecting and tries to re-establish the connection
12 OnixS::B3::BOE::SessionSettings::reconnectAttempts() times with the OnixS::B3::BOE::SessionSettings::reconnectInterval()
13 delays between attempts.
14 
15 - If the connection is restored, the session changes its state to OnixS::B3::BOE::SessionStateId::Established.
16 - If the connection cannot be restored automatically, the session changes its state to
17 OnixS::B3::BOE::SessionStateId::Disconnected.
18  After that, the connection attempt could be repeated "manually" using the OnixS::B3::BOE::Session::connect method.
19 
20 \note Reconnection works for *established* FIXP sessions only.
21
